Shareholder Name: Al Mojel Trading and Contracting Co

Description: Arabian Pipes Co (known as: APC) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since October 2002. APC operates within the Materials sector focusing on Steel. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Steel and Independent Power Producers and Energy Traders. APC is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in August 1991.
